question: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated Patanjali Research Institute at ____________.
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurates Patanjali Research Institute in Haridwar, Uttarkhand. Patanjali is a fast growing Fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) whose net sales for the financial year 2015-16 stood at Rs 5,000 crore. The company aims to steal the march over multinational firms manufacturing consumer products in the near future.
